rules.description: macOS: Switch to next app with COMMAND+CONTROL+N
macOS: Switch to previous app with COMMAND+CONTROL+P
Escape: Show application windows when pressing the ESCAPE key
TimeOut: Postpone next break by pressing COMMAND+ESCAPE
TimeOut: Start next break by pressing the OPTION+ESCAPE
macOS: Switch to previous window with COMMAND+CONTROL+P
macOS: Switch to next window with COMMAND+CONTROL+N
Browser: Focus on the address bar with COMMAND+O
Browser: Copy URL in the address bar with COMMAND+Y
Browser: Accept suggestion & go with CONTROL+F
Browser: Move tab left/right (or up/down) with COMMAND+[/]
Browser: Search tabs with COMMAND+SHIFT+T
Browser: Undo close tab with COMMAND+U
Browser: Show history with COMMAND+SHIFT+U
Browser: Switch tabs with COMMAND+SHIFT+N/P
Browser: Switch to last used tab with COMMAND+` (requires CLUT extension)
Browser: Disable COMMAND+ENTER (I press them accidentally sometimes)
Backspace: Map COMMAND+BACKSPACE to OPTION+BACKSPACE
Delete: Map COMMAND+DELETE to OPTION+DELETE
Semicolon: Swap ; and :
macOS: Open Brave with COMMAND+1
macOS: Open Kitty with COMMAND+2
macOS: Open Notes with COMMAND+3
macOS: Open Zoom with COMMAND+4
macOS: Open Finder with COMMAND+5

Zoom: Mute & unmute using the Dictation key (F5)
(remember to enable global shortcut for `Mute/Unmute My Audio` in Zoom's Settings)
Terminal: Map OPTION+DELETE to OPTION+D (ALT+D)
Terminal: Map CONTROL+N/P to DOWN/UP
Terminal: Map CONTROL+[ to ESCAPE everywhere except terminal apps
Terminal: Map COMMAND+BACKTICK to OPTION+SHIFT+BACKTICK
Return: Map RETURN to CONTROL on hold
Notes: COMMAND+F to search all notes
Notes: COMMAND+SHIFT+F to search within a note
Notes: COMMAND+N/P to go to next/previous note
HJKL: Map COMMAND+H/J/K/L to LEFT/DOWN/UP/RIGHT
HJKL: Map OPTION+H/J/K/L to OPTION+LEFT/DOWN/UP/RIGHT
HJKL: Map CONTROL+H/J/K/L to HOME/PAGE_DOWN/PAGE_UP/END
CapsLock: Map CAPSLOCK to CONTROL on hold, and to ESCAPE on tap
